name: Logical_Types
doc: Description of logical types of spark_sdk

fields.name: PHONE_NUMBER
fields.doc: International number value according to ITU E.164

fields.name: IMSI
fields.doc: International Mobile Subscriber Identity

fields.name: IMEI
fields.doc: International Mobile Equipment Identity

fields.name: DATE
fields.doc: A valid ISO-8601 value that contains a complete date representation

fields.name: TIME
fields.doc: A valid ISO-8601 value that contains a complete time representation

fields.name: DATETIME
fields.doc: A valid ISO-8601 value that contains a complete date and time representation

fields.name: TIMESTAMP
fields.doc: A valid ISO-8601 value that contains a complete date and time representation

fields.name: DURATION
fields.doc: A valid ISO-8601 value that contains a complete duration representation

fields.name: COUNTRY_CODE2
fields.doc: A valid ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country code

fields.name: COUNTRY_CODE3
fields.doc: A valid ISO-3166-1 alpha-3 country code

fields.name: COUNTRY_NUMERIC
fields.doc: A valid ISO-3166-1 numeric country code

fields.name: CURRENCY_CODE
fields.doc: A valid ISO-4217 alpha currency code

fields.name: CURRENCY_NUMERIC
fields.doc: A valid ISO-4217 numeric currency code

fields.name: DECIMAL
fields.doc: A string representation of a decimal numeral

fields.name: IPV4
fields.doc: A string representation of a ipv4

fields.name: IPV6
fields.doc: A string representation of a ipv6

fields.name: TIMEZONE
fields.doc: A string representation of timezone

fields.name: LATITUDE
fields.doc: A double representation of latitude

fields.name: LONGITUDE
fields.doc: A double representation of longitude

fields.name: GEOMETRY
fields.doc: A Geometry object represents points, curves, and surfaces in coordinate space

fields.name: FEATURE
fields.doc: A Feature object represents a spatially bounded thing

fields.name: FEATURE_COLLECTION
fields.doc: List of features

fields.name: UUID
fields.doc: A string representation of uuid

fields.name: SEMVER
fields.doc: A string representation of SemVer

fields.name: RATE
fields.doc: A float representation of rate
